Its a blackout fabric too, so grey really is the modern neutral, the go-anywhere and look great with anything shade, not to mention smart and crisp.

Burst Washed Pebble Roller Blind (Make My Blinds)

Ambiguity is the keyword with the washed pebble. It is so ambiguous we genuinely have no idea what colour it is. Somewhere on the grey/beige spectrum, it seems to sit around halfway giving it the remarkable ability to blend with a variety of decor styles. Placed amongst bolder colours like blues, reds or yellows, it acts to calm them down and make the room less overwhelming, whereas placing it with more earthy tones gives the room a neutral accent that sticks with grabs your attention.

Eco Friendly FR Grey Recycled Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Their eco-friendly, recycled roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

Lintex pvc fabrics provide a nod to industrial styling, the fabric itself have a subtle tile look finish. Available in 5 earthy tones, the range perfectly compliments cool, modern interior styling. As these are a pvc fabric they are both flame retardant & moisture resitent making this an extremely durable product. Eco Friendly FR Grey Recycled Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Their eco-friendly, recycled electric roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new grey electric roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

Whitby Blackout PVC Stone Grey Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

For a smart and contemporary finish to any room, whitby blackout pvc stone grey electric blind in stone grey is an eye-popping display of a cityscape featuring simply drawn houses interspersed with leafy trees. With a blackout fabric and a flame-retardant finish, its a great choice and the electric operation means its so easy to open and close. Plus, it's made of moisture resistant fabric so it's easy to keep it clean.

Loras Blackout Melody Grey Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Loras blackout melody grey is an eye-catching electric roller blind that will add instant pretty appeal to your window of choice. With an electric operation system, it quickly opens and closes at the touch of a button. Featuring clusters of soft, white blossom and green leaves with bluebirds perching on branches its a serene design that will gain many compliments. This blind is made using a specialist blackout fabric so the light will stay firmly away when this blind is closed.

Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

This stylish japanese inspired design features a soft wash of grey with hints of white and touches of pink to give it the perfect balance of pastel colour. Little blossom sits on delicate branches giving this an air of peace and tranquillity. Ideal to dress up a light and airy room, gorgeous cherry blossom blackout serenity grey roller blind is made from a luxurious blackout faux silk and treated with pollergen, a unique fabric treatment that neutralises pollen so helping to relieve hayfever symptoms.
